verses.name: 1 Kings 22:26
verses.text: And the king of Israel said, Take Micaiah, and carry him back unto Amon the governor of the city, and to Joash the king’s son;

verses.name: 1 Kings 22:27
verses.text: And say, Thus saith the king, Put this fellow in the prison, and feed him with bread of affliction and with water of affliction, until I come in peace.

verses.name: 1 Kings 22:28
verses.text: And Micaiah said, If thou return at all in peace, the Lord hath not spoken by me. And he said, Hearken, O people, every one of you.

verses.name: 1 Kings 22:29
verses.text: So the king of Israel and Jehoshaphat the king of Judah went up to Ramoth–gilead.
